data.name: Runaway Animals
data.detailed_description:
Key Features

  • Story-driven gameplay.
  • Difficulty Levels.
  • Single-player and Multiplayer up to 4 players.
  • Progression system, which helps you earn new characters and skins as you play.

  • Adjustable game parameters for personalized experiences allowing for more replayability.

Story

  • Various individuals have seen a mysterious man with a monkey on multiple occasions. This person normally liberates animals that are in captivity. Sometimes these animals flee and enter places where they should not be. The authorities still don´t know this man´s whereabouts and the reason for his actions.

Gameplay

  • In the first chapter, you play as an underpaid employee at the Tyrant Grand Hotel. You must complete all your tasks while uncontrolled animals roam the place.
  • You can use objects around the area to help you fend off the wild animals.


  • You can use power-ups to recover health, be faster, stronger, and invincible for a short period of time. The power-ups can be shared with players close by.


  • You also have some chat commands so you can say simple things like: "Follow me" or "Protect me" to players who are close to you.

data.short_description: Runaway Animals is a 1-4 player co-op & PvP action-comedy game. A mysterious man with a monkey freeing wild animals in captivity. What could go wrong? Complete your duties at your underpaid job while you cope with these uncontrollable animals in this story-driven adventure.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Spain, French, German, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Portuguese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 (64x)
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual Core.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64x)
  • Processor: 2.7 GHz Dual Core.
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

Minimum:

mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
